MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH49 postcode area of Linlithgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:40pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:55pm on 9th February 2021.
